original_text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before, that ye might have a second benefit;
korean_text: 내가 이 확신을 가지고 너희로 두 번 은혜를 얻게 하기 위하여 먼저 너희에게 이르렀다가

sentences.original_text: I was minded to come unto you before
that ye might have a second benefit
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 두 번째 은혜를 받게 하려 함이라
